title: The Flight of dragons
creator_contributor_role: Victorian Council for Children's Films and Television, distributor
description: A magical fantasy set between the Age of Magic and the Age of Science that will enchant all viewers as they become part of the magical adventure. The story begins in modern times with Peter, brought back in time through the assistance of wizards to lead the quest to capture the Red Crown of Ommadon. The crown is a powerful tool, used by the Red Wizard to destroy nature. The dragons play the important role of transporting Peter and the good wizards in their battle against evil. Based on the book of the same name by Peter Dickinson and featuring the voices of Victor Buono, James Gregory, James Earl Jones, Harry Morgan and John Ritter. Warning: There is a line across the top half of the screen at the start of the video.
